name: SHELLSHOCK
description:
This is a tank shooter game which is 2 player (Keybard, arrowkeys)

This is not an online game and it is also in early access.

In the future this game may have online servers but for now there isn't.

Updates will be random because I will be busy making other games.

When the game gets fully released there will be a big update.

Control Instructions:

Player 1: Keyboard to move and space to shoot.

Player 2: Arrow keys to move and enter to shoot.
